sentences.en: A new born gosling joined the goose family.
sentences.cn: 一只新生小鹅加入鹅家.

sentences.en: According to Gosling, the professional snoop must be careful about jumping to any quick conclusions.
sentences.cn: 据高斯林称, 职业的窥探者必须小心,不要急于下结论.

sentences.en: Dazzling her pearls and emeralds gosling - gold the painted design on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她的玉石与翡翠闪耀着光芒,她的额上装饰着金色的图案.

sentences.en: Established methods of indirect in situ PCR detected from the paraffin section of gosling plague virus.
sentences.cn: 建立了间接原位PCR从石蜡切片中检测小鹅瘟病毒的方法.

sentences.en: General gosling feeding more than two months, the average body weight of up to 6 - 7 kg.
sentences.cn: 一般雏鹅饲养两个多月后, 其体重平均可达6至7公斤.

sentences.en: Giles Gosling himself was somewhat scandalized at the obstreperous nature of their mirth.
sentences.cn: 吉尔斯·戈斯林本人看到大家高兴起来那么喧哗,有点难为情.

sentences.en: This report is about diagnosis and control of gosling pest.
sentences.cn: 这份报告是关于小鹅瘟的诊断与防制的。

trans.tran_cn: 小鹅，愚蠢而无经验的人
